sqoop.arg: SELECT AcquisitionID,Acquisition,AcquisitionCode,Description, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Acquisition WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AcquisitionVariableTypeID,AcquisitionVariantID,VariableTypeID,NoHeads,NoSamples,NoPositions,EntryOrder,Formula, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AcquisitionVariableType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ActionStatusID,ActionStatus,ConditionalFormat,IsClosedState, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ActionStatus WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AssetCycleCountID,AssetID,RfDayPeriodID,Count,AssetCountTypeID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AssetCycleCount WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AcquisitionVariantID,TargetSampleSize,RfAttrStudyTypeID,Instructions,ImageURI,NoHeads,RfSourceID,DataDeviceID,DeviceArgs,DeviceOutput, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AVAttribute WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT CauseActionID,Comments,LoginID,OpenedDT,SavedDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedCauseActionID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.CauseAction_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT CostCentreID,CostCentre,Description, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.CostCentre WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT DepartmentID,Name,DepartmentGroup,Classification1,PlantID,DepartmentCode,Description, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Department WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT FaultStateID,FaultID,FromDT,ToDT,FaultStatusID,Comments,LoginID,OpenedDT,SavedDT,IsEdited,RevisionNo,OriginalLoginID,EditedFaultStateID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.FaultState WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT InventoryUsageID,JobID,MachineStageID,InventoryPackID,FromDT,ToDT,IsEdited,RevisionNo,IsReintroduced,Quantity, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.InventoryUsage WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT LineInfoID,RfLineInfoEventID,LineID,ShiftID,WOID,FromDT,ToDT,rfDayHourPeriodID,TotalTime,ExcludedTime,ScheduledTime,STOperations,STInduced,DTTechnical,DTOperations,DTQuality,DownTime,StopTime,RunTime,NotRunTime,TheoreticalCycleTime,QuantityScrap,QuantityGood,ModifiedDT,LoginID,QuantityIn,TotalInventoryProduced,TotalInventoryReintroduced,NetQuantityProduced,QuantityInLineSpoilage,TotalSpoilage,AccountedSpoilage,TotalInventoryIsolated,ProductionStopJobID,TotalUnitsProduced,BottleNeckMachineStageID,InventoryIn,InterProdStopTime,InProdStopTime,QuantityUnitsIn,QuantityInventoryIn,TotalQuantityProduced,TotalPacksProduced,TotalPacksIsolated,TotalPacksReintroduced,TotalPacksMade,ValidState,LineGroupID,LineGroupShiftID,LineGroupBottleneckID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LineInfo WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AcquisitionGroupID,AcquisitionVariantID,Sequence,LkAGAVID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkAGAV WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkConcernRootCauseID,RootCauseID,ConcernID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkConcernRootCause WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkDocumentWIProcID,WorkInstructionProcedureID,DocumentID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkDocumentWIProc WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkLocationMachineStageId,MachineStageId,LocationId,IsLocationIn,IsLocationOut, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkLocationMachineStage WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OperationTypeID,MachineStageTypeID,LkOpTMSTID,PassName, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkOpTMST WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT PartID,UnitID,LkPartUnitID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LKPartUnit WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolTypeID,OperationTypeID,MaxNoTools,LkToolTypeOpTypeID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkToolTypeOpType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkWIRBuildRecordID,WorkInstructionResultID,BuildRecordID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkWIRBuildRecord WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MachineStageInvPositionId,MachineStageId,Position,PositionNumber, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MachineStageInvPosition WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintenanceManHoursID,MaintenanceWorkID,WorkerLoginID,ActualManHours,RevisionNo,IsEdited,ModifiedDT,SupplierID,SupplierCost,PersonnelGroupID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceManHours WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintenanceProcedureRevisionID,MaintenanceProcedureID,FromDT,ToDT,IsEdited,RevisionNo,LoginID,ModifiedDT,RevisedMaintProcID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceProcedureRevision WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintProcScheduleOnAssetID,MaintenanceProcedureID,AssetID,RfPeriodTypeID,StartDate,AssetCountTypeID,EBAReference,IsEdited,LoginID,ModifiedDT,CalendarN1,CalendarN2,CalendarN3,CounterThreshold1,CounterThreshold2,CounterThreshold3,EstimatedCountPerDay,RunHourThreshold1,RunHourThreshold2,RunHourThreshold3,EstimatedRunHoursPerDay,EstimatedEventsPerDay,RevisionNo,IsRetired,PriorExecutions, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintProcScheduleOnAsset WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT SerialNo,TimePacked,IMS_No, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ModulePackedDateTime_Buffer WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT OPCItemID,OPCServerID,OPCGroupID,TagName,TagAddress,RfOPCItemTypeID,IsNotify,RawValue,UpdatedDT,Quality,Value,LastRawValue,LastUpdatedDT,LastQuality,LastValue,MachineStageID,ChangeAction,PLCID,IsDatedOnServer,IsStoredAsArray,IsActive,MachineStageEventTypeID,RfTransitionTypeID,TransitionToValue, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCItem WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OPCSpeedID,OPCItemID,Description,Scale,Formula,ModifiedDT,LoginID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCSpeed WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT PartSubClassificationID,PartSubClassification,PartClassificationID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.PartSubClassification WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ProductionStopReasonID,ProductionStopReason,Description,StopCode,RfLineStopReasonTypeID,RfStopRelativeToJobID,IsPlanned,IsDefaultNoJobReason,IsRetired, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ProductionStopReason WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ScrapReasonID,ScrapReason,Description,MachineStageTypeID,DefaultUnitID,IsRetired, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ScrapReason WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ShiftlyChecksDoneID,shiftid,jobid,fromdt,todt,partid,acquisitioncontextid,machinestageid,acquisitionvariantid,acquisitionid,downtime,uptime,total_time,datacollectionperiod,checks_req,checks_req_after_downtime,checks_done,updated_dt, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ShiftlyChecksDone WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SPCChartControlLimitID,SPCChartComponentID,RfChartComponentID,RfChart,UCL,CL,LCL,FromDT,ToDT,RangeToDT,ModifiedDT,LoginID,RangeFromDT, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCChartControlLimit WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SPCDefaultViewID,Sequence,RfChartSetViewTypeID,NoCols,NoRows,Caption,Tooltip,IsAggregated,RfCutByIDs,IsPanelled,ImageURI,GridImageRender,ParetoXAxis,ParetoStackBy,SPCChartSetViewStyleID,IsAutoFit,AcquisitionUsageID,OverlayFlags, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCDefaultView WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagDefID,TagOwnerID,RfTable,TagTypeID,TagValue,DT, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagDef WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagProfileID,Name, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagProfile WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ShiftID,JobID,AcquisitionContextID,Checks_Done, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TMP_Checks_Done WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ToolAtLocationID,LocationID,ToolID,FromDT,ToDT,IsEdited,RevisionNo,EditedToolAtLocationID,MovedByLoginID,ModifiedDT,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ToolAtLocation WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ToolTypeID,ToolType,ToolTypeCode,Description,Variant1TagListID,Variant2TagListID,Variant3TagListID,Variant4TagListID,Variant5TagListID,Variant6TagListID,Variant7TagListID,Variant8TagListID,Variant9TagListID,Variant10TagListID,Variant11TagListID,Variant12TagListID,Variant13TagListID,Variant14TagListID,Variant15TagListID,Variant16TagListID,Variant17TagListID,Variant18TagListID,Variant19TagListID,Variant20TagListID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ToolType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT UnitCountID,CollectionQuantity,CollectionUnitID,Comments,LoginID,OpenedDT,SavedDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedUnitCountID,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.UnitCount_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT VariableTypeClassID,VariableTypeClass,Description,Priority, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.VariableTypeClass WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT WOID,BaseWONumber,Txn_date,Wip_Entity_ID,Alternate_Bom,WO_Status,IsBtoCto, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.WO_custom WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT Line.LineID, Line.Line, Line.Description, Line.LineTypeID, Line.IsRetired, Line.RfIntervalModeID, Line.IsOEEInventoryIsolation, Line.IsOEEInventoryReintroduction, Line.IsCountOutputInventory, Line.IsCountInputInventory, Line.IsLineInfoSweepEnabled, Line.IsWOOnSingleJob, Line.LineShortName, Line.CurrentLineInfoID, Line.LastLineInfoID, Line.RfInvCreatedDateModeID, Line.RfEndJobInvModeID, Line.CurrentJobID, Line.IsScrapAsQualityLoss, Line.IsScrapInProductionCounts, Line.LineDownCostPerHour, Line.IsContributeLineGroupOutput, Line.IsContributeLineGroupWaste, Line.IsContributeLineGroupDowntime, Line_.OEETarget, Line_.WasteTarget, Line_.Reference1, Line_.Reference2, Line_.Reference3, Line_.Reference4, Line_.Reference5, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM Line FULL JOIN Line_ ON (Line.LineID = Line_.LineID) FULL JOIN Line_Custom ON (Line.LineID = Line_Custom.LineID) WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
